questions_and_notes: This is "where land" whereas the variable above it is unmasked.  I know if data are mapped to a target grid, you might mix ocean and land cloudiness, but is it absolutely necessary to avoid that? Consider eliminating one of these.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
comment: Total cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.
